entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is ignored by someone and makes his way to Gryﬀindor Tower.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: A portrait that guards the entrance to Gryﬀindor common room. She asks for a password before allowing entry.

entities.name: colin creevey
entities.description: A second-year student at Hogwarts who is deeply in awe of Harry and tries to speak to him.

relationships.description: Harry interacts with the Fat Lady by giving her the password, Fortuna Major.
